name: reaper-control
description: Reaper Control Application with Frontend and Backend

scripts.link-env: [ -f .env ] || cp .env.example .env; ([ -d frontend ] && ln -sf ../.env frontend/.env; [ -d backend ] && ln -sf ../.env backend/.env)
scripts.dev: npm run link-env && concurrently "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
scripts.start: npm run link-env && concurrently "npm run start-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
